attributes.action: resigne now and call an election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
gordon brown should resigne right now and call an election we the public should have a say who runs this country and the powers should never have been passed either by blair or the queen,
we have been trod on enough by this goverment, there all gunners at the end of the day going to do this and that and nothing gets done but there all on our door steps when the elections are here

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
